title: Life will never be the same
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Australia
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenagers - Family relationships
abstract: 'There is more to Australia than a lot of people think.'
description: 'You don't need to jump on a plane, or go to a theme park or stay at a five star hotel to experience the beautiful things in life.' Amanda Jurisic remembers her father's legacy : a sense of adventure and a love of travel. The values he taught her have stayed with her, and inspired her to travel the world.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002321; Western stories : expressions for the future; Active; 2010
